docs.snippet: To help prepare you for your Oscar pools, the IFC Theater in New York is presenting Academy-nominated animated and live-action short films....
docs.lead_paragraph: Remember how we were going to help you arm yourself against those usual Oscar pool-defeaters, the short film categories? Now we don't have to, because they're playing at a theater near you (if you're in New York, anyway). This weekend the IFC Center presents the Academy-nominated animated and live-action shorts. Among the latter, many feature children in peril, "the quickest route to an audience's emotions," as A.O. Scott writes.
docs.abstract: To help prepare you for your Oscar pools, the IFC Theater in New York is presenting Academy-nominated animated and live-action short films.

headline.main: Short on Time, Long on Wit and Daring

docs.lead_paragraph: “The Crazies” aims to scare moviegoers and elevate their social consciousness, too.

headline.seo: The Citizenry of ‘The Crazies’: Unhinged, but for a Cause
headline.main: Homicidally Unhinged, but for a Cause
headline.print_headline: Homicidally Unhinged, But for a Cause

docs.snippet: Neither of their films, "Avatar" and "Up in the Air" garnered any awards, though other Academy frontrunners, including Mo'Nique and Christoph Waltz, continued to rack up the statuettes....
docs.lead_paragraph: Critical love is never-ending for Kathryn Bigelow, who won the best director award for "The Hurt Locker" from the London Critics' Circle on Thursday, again besting two of her Oscar opponents, James Cameron and Jason Reitman. Neither of their films, "Avatar" and "Up in the Air" garnered any awards, though other Academy front-runners, including Mo'Nique and Christoph Waltz, continued to rack up the statuettes -- Mo'Nique for her performance in "Precious: Based on the Novel 'Push' by Sapphire" and Mr. Waltz for his in "Inglourious Basterds." (By this point in the season, the Bagger wishes she had invented some kind of keyboard shortcuts for these statements - maybe a sassy apostrophe for Mo'Nique and a stern but sexy ß for Mr. Waltz. Ms. Bigelow would get a new symbol which would immediately become shorthand for killer-lady-director.)
docs.abstract: Neither of their films, "Avatar" and "Up in the Air" garnered any awards, though other Academy frontrunners, including Mo'Nique and Christoph Waltz, continued to rack up the statuettes.

docs.snippet: Greg Sloane, a homeless man who spends more time in theaters than most movie critics, offers his Oscar picks and other insights....
docs.lead_paragraph: Perhaps the most regular visitor to the New York Public Library for the Performing Arts is Greg Sloane, who can be seen nearly every day among the dancers, musicians, actors and culture-mongers who flock to this gem at Lincoln Center.
docs.abstract: Greg Sloane, a homeless man who spends more time in theaters than most movie critics, offers his Oscar picks and other insights.

headline.main: The Wisdom and Wit of an Irregular Library Regular

docs.snippet: In this Sunday's Arts & Leisure, A.O. Scott considers the unpredictable and graceful performances that keep awing audiences and Oscar voters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Meryl Streep's Oscar nomination - for portraying a pitch-perfect Julia Child in "Julie & Julia" - surprised absolutely no one (that was Sandra Bullock's territory). In this Sunday's Arts & Leisure, A.O. Scott considers the Streepness of the woman he calls "the best screen actress in the world" and finds that she is in some ways a late bloomer as a star, and that this makes her all the more appealing.
docs.abstract: In this Sunday's Arts & Leisure, A.O. Scott considers the unpredictable and graceful performances that keep awing audiences and Oscar voters.

docs.snippet: Previous misadventures in Hollywood inspired Armando Iannucci in crafting "In the Loop," a satire about British and American politicians in the run-up to an unnamed, Iraq-like war....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Armando Iannucci, the director and a screenwriter of "In the Loop," heard the news that it had been nominated for an Oscar for best original screenplay, he was in London, about to have lunch with some friends. He never lifted a fork.
docs.abstract: Previous misadventures in Hollywood inspired Armando Iannucci in crafting "In the Loop," a satire about British and American politicians in the run-up to an unnamed, Iraq-like war.

docs.snippet: New laws are in the works in San Francisco to make smoking more difficult. To thwart secondhand fumes, the city is considering a ban on smoking in many outside areas....
docs.lead_paragraph: It is one of the more infamous scenes in locally anchored cinema: The "Basic Instinct" murder suspect portrayed by Sharon Stone sits in a San Francisco police station, picks up a cigarette and is quickly told she can't light up.
docs.abstract: New laws are in the works in San Francisco to make smoking more difficult. To thwart secondhand fumes, the city is considering a ban on smoking in many outside areas.
